description:
The lightest certified avalanche recue shovel on the market. The blade is engineered for maximum snow removal within a small footprint. It collapses to only 56cm to fit inside most backpacks and works great for shovelling in tight spaces and for building shelters.

  • Extendable two-piece aluminum shaft
  • T-grip provides good leverage
  • Ultra-strong lightweight aluminum blade
  • Riveted shovel blade bites into hard snow and debris
  • Surface area of 550cm² moves snow quickly
  • Extended length is 76cm, collapsed length is 56cm
name: Black Diamond Transfer LT Shovel
